summary: A poor, uneducated mountain girl leaves her cabin in search of respect, a wealthy husband, and a better life in this fictionalized biopic of Margaret "Molly" Brown, who survived the 1912 sinking of the RMS Titanic.
cast: Debbie Reynolds|Harve Presnell|Ed Begley|Jack Kruschen|Hermione Baddeley|Vassili Lambrinos|Fred Essler|Harvey Lembeck|Lauren Gilbert|Kathryn Card|Hayden Rorke|Harry Holcombe|Amy Douglass|George Mitchell|Martita Hunt|Vaughn Taylor|Anthony Eustrel|Audrey Christie|Grover Dale|Brendan Dillon|Maria Karnilova|Gus Trikonis|Leon Alton|Maria Andre|Tom Anfinsen|Gertrude Astor|Eleanor Audley|Robert Banas|Brandon Beach|Pat Benedetto|Martin Bolger|Nick Borgani|Peter Camlin|Phyllis Coghlan|Robert Cole|Cathleen Cordell|Jennifer Crier|Beppie De Vries|George Dega|Harry Denny|Dan Dowling|James Drake|Minta Durfee|Charles Giorgi|Clive Halliday|Chuck Hamilton|Ramsay Hill|George Holmes|Jimmie Horan|Michael Jeffers|Harvey Karels|Joseph La Cava|Anna Lee|Robert Locke Lorraine|Moyna MacGill|Maurice Marks|Scott McCartor|Sheila Menzies|Pat Moran|George Nardelli|Ottola Nesmith|George Nicholson|Mary Ann Niles|John Pedrini|Maruja Plose|Joe Ploski|Paul Power|Paul Ravel|Waclaw Rekwart|John Roy|Michael St. Clair|Herb Vigran|Kathryn Wilson
title: Molly Brown, siempre a flote
